LanguageData.CAN_MakeInsectPemmican.label: make insect pemmican
LanguageData.CAN_MakeInsectPemmican.description: Make Insect pemmican, a preserved combination of Insect meat and organic food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.
LanguageData.CAN_MakeInsectPemmicanCampfire.label: make insect pemmican
LanguageData.CAN_MakeInsectPemmicanCampfire.descripti: Make Insect pemmican, a preserved combination of Insect meat and organic food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.
LanguageData.CAN_CookInsectMealSimple.label: cook simple insect meal
LanguageData.CAN_CookInsectMealSimple.description: Cooks a straightforward meal from Insect meat.
LanguageData.CAN_CookInsectMealSimpleCampfire.label: cook simple insect meal
LanguageData.CAN_CookInsectMealSimpleCampfire.descrip: Cooks a straightforward meal from Insect meat.
LanguageData.CAN_CookInsectMealFine.label: cook fine insect meal
LanguageData.CAN_CookInsectMealFine.description: Cooks a somewhat complex Insect meal from a combination of Insect meat and organic ingredients.
LanguageData.CAN_CookInsectMealLavish.label: cook lavish insect meal
LanguageData.CAN_CookInsectMealLavish.description: Cooks a very complex Insect meal from a combination of Insect meat and organic ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
LanguageData.CAN_CookInsectMealSurvival.label: cook packaged survival insect meal
LanguageData.CAN_CookInsectMealSurvival.description: Cooks a packaged survival Insect meal from a combination of Insect meat and organic ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
